icecreamData.name: Choclate ice cream
icecreamData.description: Chocolate ice cream is generally made by blending cocoa powder, and the eggs, cream, vanilla, and sugar used to make vanilla ice cream

icecreamData.name: Vanilla ice cream
icecreamData.description: Vanilla ice cream is a sweet frozen dessert made from milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla flavoring from vanilla seeds, pure vanilla extract, vanilla seed paste, or a combination.
